explains: n. 圣洁；尊严；神圣不可侵犯性

sentences.en: The high untrespassed sanctity of space
sentences.cn: 我脚踏高得无人涉足的神圣空间

sentences.en: The sanctity of marriage is once again under attack.
sentences.cn: 婚姻的神圣再次受到攻击。

sentences.en: He defended until death, or non-publication, the sanctity of his words.
sentences.cn: 他至死都捍卫着他文字的神圣，宁可作品不获出版。
